mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1984 Season
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for the 1984 Season at the Barter Theatre. Programs: Tintypes by Mary Kyte, Mel Marvin, and Gary Pearle | Crimes of the Heart, Beth Henley | Good Doctor, Neil Simon | Artichoke, Joanna M. Glass | Mass Appeal, Bill C. Davis | Promenade All!, David V Robison | Bell Book and Candle, John Van Druten.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
